title: Maou wo Shoukan Shitara Konomi no Onnanoko Datta node Kyuuai Shitemimashita ~ Maou to Isshoni Sekai wo Sukuu Kyuuseishu no Monogatari ~ (Kari) - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Alternate World   Demon Lord   Familiars   Female Protagonist   Hypnotism   Love at First Sight   Reincarnated in Another World   Saving the World
author: KMY
description:
Attending magic school, Arisa summoned the Demon Lord Valgis as a familiar!

The appearance of the enemy of humanity, the Demon Lord that consolidated the Demon Country causes a great panic! However, Arisa tries to court the Demon Lord. Eh, after all, they’re both women!?

At this time, nobody thought so.

That Arisa would join hands with the Demon Lord, destroy the human kingdom, and end up saving the world…

This is, the story of Arisa and the Demon Lord deepening their Yuri love, while becoming humanity’s saviors.>
